scripts.preinstall: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:backend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:all && npm run copy:all
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev:nodemon" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test" "cd frontend && npm run test" "cd frontend && npm run storybook"
